channel.title: [ONLINE] Revival Rs 317 - Old School
channel.description:
[b]Forums[/b] [url=http://revival-rs.tk/]http://revival07.tk/[/url]
Hello members of the Mopar Community I present to you Revival-Rs I know what you all may be thinking "Look another remake!" but the reason for why we are doing this is that for me and a couple of friends Runescape back in 2006 was the most amazing and fun filled time we'd ever had. I don't expect this to get around 500-1000 players to be honest im doing this to try and relive the past memories that I had.
We will be using the released version of 2006Memorys but fixing many known bugs/glitches/dupes and adding much more complete content. The reason for why we are using such a complete base is because I do not want to spend alot of time on this project and mainly get on to playing it along with many other eager players.
Xp Rate : x30
[b]Features[/b]
Perfect Combat Pvp Fully complete Pvn Fully complete X-logging Many Skills working Many minigames All Random Events Pets Treasure Trails Skill Interfaces Nostalgic Feel
[b]Media[/b]
The networking has been edited and i tested it out by running 2000 bots they were spamming all in one spot and the server was not lagging alot but it was lagging may be because of my computer so to keep it from disconnecting actual players a cap of 1000 has been set as the players will be doing much more then just spamming.
[img]http://i62.tinypic.com/vsgrgm.png[/img]
The sage of lumbridge has been with us for such a long time no remake is complete without him!
[img]http://i58.tinypic.com/34ziykp.png[/img]
Although this image isn't of RR it still shows the pvp aspect of the 2006 era of runescape it was a ton of fun pking alongside your friends and your clan.
[img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2n3txd.png[/img]
Remember the good old trading days before the grand exchange and when players were actually communicating with one another well we're trying to revive those memories.
[img]http://i60.tinypic.com/256qxyr.png[/img]
Random events are a good way to get some items and gain some expierience and they also help stop bots from gold farming
[img]http://i58.tinypic.com/4vnwhv.png[/img]
Yes This is a Remake Dupes Bugs And Stability Fixes Come Join Us And Have Fun!
